plans.co_payment: 10% for out-patient services; No co-payment for in-patient at network hospitals
plans.hospital_network: All private hospitals in Botswana and specialized network in RSA
plans.maternity_cover: Pula Baby Programme: 100% cover for delivery, 2 scans, and prenatal vitamins (Subject to AOL)
plans.chronic_cover: Unlimited (Subject to AOL) for 27 conditions; P50,000 for non-listed conditions
plans.dental_optical: Dental: P12,880, Optical: P5,120 per family per year
plans.waiting_period: 3 months general, 9 months maternity, 12-24 months for pre-existing conditions
